body.p: Quick Start : A brief introduction helping a user to get started with WSO2 Governance Registry in no-time. More detailed guidelines are found in the documents listed below.

Installation Guide : Gives basic steps on how to download, install, and run WSO2 Governance Registry using the binary distribution, and how to build WSO2 Governance Registry using the source distribution.
User Guide : A manual on how to run and configure the WSO2 Governance Registry through the management console.
Developer Guide : A manual on how developers can use WSO2 Governance Registry in their developments.
Migration Guide : A manual on how to migrate from older versions of the WSO2 Governance Registry to the latest version.

How to Run the WSO2 Governance Registry Samples : While the document above gives you a generic description on how to set up and and run the WSO2 Governance Registry samples, this document takes each sample, one by one and discusses the objective of the sample, its prerequisites, and its expected behavior when the sample is built.
Setting up registry with databases, H2, MySQL, MSSQL, Oracle, Derby, DB2, PostgreSQL and OpenEdge.
The WSO2 Oxygen Tank Library : The Library contains articles, tutorials, presentations, and other knowledge base items published on The Oxygen Tank.
Wiki Space : This is the working Wiki for WSO2 Governance Registry.
